title: New stories and bios - Yuumi, yordles, and Draven!
body:
[**The Whispering Doodad**, featuring Tristana, Lulu, an unnamed ~~yordle~~ spirit narrator (oooh...), and... Draven and Tamara?](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/the-whispering-doodad/)

[**The Biggest Catch**, featuring Yuumi and her adventures in Bilgewater](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/yuumi-color-story/)

[Lulu's new bio](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/champion/lulu/)

[Tristana's new bio](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/tristana/)

replies.body: Lulu fucked with the Order of Shadow? That's fucking hilarious.
Lulu trolling the assassins. That sounds familiar...
Narrative cohesion!
I need fan art of this ASAP.
Its' really light considering how long Bandle city had nothing.... Honestly a bit disappointing.

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=N1GkMWKy,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-05-14T19:05:27.906+0000)
>
> Its' really light considering how long Bandle city had nothing.... Honestly a bit disappointing.

really agree

Was hoping Riot would take advantage of the whole map thing and put a bunch of little Bandle Portals on the Map each with artwork and actual facts about Bandle city, how it came to be, what its' actually like there show us some new art.

We didn't learn anything new from either of these stories. We already knew Yordles use glamor to hide their appearance and we already knew Bandle City has a "timeless quality". The only thing this update did was establish Tristana and Lulus background which are roughly the same as they were before.

Been waiting since we thought Neeko was a Yordle for this?

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=N1GkMWKy,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2019-05-14T19:29:27.982+0000)
>
> Was hoping Riot would take advantage of the whole map thing and put a bunch of little Bandle Portals on the Map each with artwork and actual facts about Bandle city, how it came to be, what its' actually like there show us some new art.
> 
> We didn't learn anything new from either of these stories. We already knew Yordles use glamor to hide their appearance and we already knew Bandle City has a "timeless quality". The only thing this update did was establish Tristana and Lulus background which are roughly the same as they were before.
> 
> Been waiting since we thought Neeko was a Yordle for this?

On the bright side, since we have some grounded information on what Bandle City is now and how it came to be, perhaps this could lead to more Yordle bio updates and short stories down the line. I'm just waiting to see the hilarity of the Teemo-Tristana-Rumble love triangle in action. 

Also, we had two patches since the last lore update; Riot better give us some big dumps from here on out to make up for it!
I presume you've all seen the updated Bandle City page on Universe, complete with some brand new artwork and explanations of yordle glamour?

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=N1GkMWKy,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-14T19:56:36.316+0000)
>
> I presume you've all seen the updated Bandle City page on Universe, complete with some brand new artwork and explanations of yordle glamour?

Of course, but there are many things still yet to be revealed about the Yordles we know! We have one Yordle who has interestingly joined a group of the most spiritually-connected humans out there {{champion:85}}, another with connections to both his home city and Piltover, leading us to not even know where he resides at the moment {{champion:42}}, and of course, {{champion:17}}. I don't think I need to say any more about him. But I should hope you have exciting things in store for us with ALL the Yordles, and coming as soon as it can come. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

If *I* lived in a magical realm outside time and space, we could have done all of this already...

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

Thanks for pointing this out, nice to know glamour is still an innate thing they have. Looking forward to Rumble and the Piltovan Yordles getting bios whenever the come. The portals explanation is good too, nice art to go with it.

Janna mention is nice.

Did I understand correctly that Tamara and Draven is in love? It would be strange for Draven, I always assumed that he is too egoistical for love

Love is a bit much I think

It's more that their traded insults are insincere. That they actually really don't mind each other

So this update featuring new LU's for Tristana and Lulu was very predictable, I called it that Corki & Rumble will be permanently on the backburner. Although I'm completely surprised that Teemo's is on the backburner too.
Whispering Doodad Really hit home. Nothing like being ***THIS*** close to winning a 2v1 when the jg pops in. Draven just can't catch a break!

> [{quoted}](name=Call Me Draven,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=N1GkMWKy,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-05-15T00:45:45.573+0000)
>
> Whispering Doodad Really hit home. Nothing like being ***THIS*** close to winning a 2v1 when the jg pops in. Draven just can't catch a break!

And a Tristana-Lulu botlane of all things. A very annoying combination, especially for a Draven. Especially for a Draven without his support.
THE RABBIT.  THE FUCKING RABBIT.
It's a nature spirit narrating The Whispering Doodad, wouldn't call it a yordle. But stories are awesome, just didn't like the Yuumi one. Felt usual to me, nothing special.
Oh. Went into full theorycrafting mode for a bit and figured it was our new assassin... talk about reading too much into things.

Finally Lulu lore! I've been wondering how she'd fit in since the Yordle retcon. Pretty good!

I love Tris's new bio.

Yuumi's story is pretty cute, although it kinda sticks out that the rescued Yordle tells Yuumi that he hopes she finds her Yordle, when Yuumi never mentioned anything about her quest.

TWD is absolutely amazing and just what I'd expect from a story starring Lulu and Tris. I really enjoyed the narrator as well, best support.

Damn, poor Tamara and Draven ended up escorting the Legendary Noxian Red Shirt Brigade. I think it might be contagious.

Though I did like that none of the Noxians actually seemed to _die_, I appreciate the cutesy cartoon-style violence Tristana and Lulu pulled.

While the stories were fine, and anything is welcome really. I wished Teemo got something, poor guy hasn't really had anything said about him in almost a decade. Id really like to see his bio updated, as it stands there really is nothing I can say about him that dosn't come from when the Institute of War was still around.
I'm so hyped that they wrote a new story featuring Tristana and Lulu! :D And I'm really glad that they're giving Trist a new bio that isn't just about her supposed relationship with Teemo.
I just so happens that Tristana is my least favorite adc to face.

Really? My least favorites are Ezreal and Vayne. Far worse mechanics and Ezreal doesn't even really have to be good at his champion; he just has to sit on his ass and throw Q's from under his tower. Extremely uninteractive.

YORDLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLES!!!

YES

oh i have NEEDED this
So is the narrator the new assassin coming out later this year or what, because from what we've heard of them it sounds like they could be.
LOL the Lulu/Trist story. Looney Toons style violence is adorable ^_^
Where is yuumi? Is she not out yet?
